text:
London, UK - Full time - ONEIS

We're looking for a developer to join our team.

Like a startup: Small dedicated team. No barriers to doing your best work. Opportunity to get involved with everything, should you want to. Lovely office, great espresso.

Not like a startup: Sensible working hours. Quiet environment away from the hustle. No random pressure from investors. Quality product without hacks.

http://www.oneis.co.uk/jobs
